org.ensembl.compara.driver
Class RegistryXMLParser

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.compara.driver.RegistryXMLParser
public class RegistryXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object

Contains a read and a write method for translating a registry back and forth into a simple XML schema.
Example of use which reads a registry from a perl file and writes it back out to xml: Registry myRegistry = Registry.loadFromPerlFile(perlFile); String xmlString = RegistryXMLParser.getXMLForRegistry(); File xmlFile = new File(myXMLFileName); FileWriter writer = new FileWriter(xmlFile); writer.write(xmlString);

Author:
vvi@sanger.ac.uk
